statements: UPDATE genomic_variation_data SET genotype = 'AA' WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND position = 1000;
UPDATE genomic_variation_data SET allele_frequency = 0.25, disease_risk_prediction = 0.75 WHERE variant_id = 10;
UPDATE genomic_variation_data SET genotype = 'AA', allele_frequency = 0.75 WHERE variant_id = 1001;
UPDATE genomic_variation_data SET disease_risk_prediction = 0.85, nucleotide_change = 'A>C' WHERE chromosome = 'chrX' AND position = 12456;
UPDATE SampleTable1 SET chromosome = 'chr1', position = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SampleTable2 SET genotype = 'ATC', quality_score = 8.5 WHERE sample_id = 10;
UPDATE SampleTable1 SET allele='A' WHERE variant_id=1 AND id=100
UPDATE SampleTable2 SET genotype='CC', quality_score=8.5 WHERE sample_id=10 AND id=50
UPDATE Genomic_Variations SET chrom='chr22', position=1234, ref='A', alt='T' WHERE variation_id=1;
UPDATE Disease_Predictions SET prediction=0.85, disease_name='Cancer' WHERE variation_id=2;
UPDATE Genomic_Variations SET ref = 'C', alt = 'T' WHERE variation_id = 1
UPDATE Disease_Predictions SET prediction = 0.85, disease_name = 'Cancer' WHERE variation_id = 3
UPDATE GenomicVariationData SET VariantDescription = 'New variant description', GeneSymbol = 'ABC' WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE DiseaseRiskPrediction SET ModelUsed = 'Logistic Regression', RiskScore = 0.75 WHERE PatientID = 100 AND PredictionDate = '2021-09-15';

UPDATE GenomicVariationData SET VariationType='Substitution', VariantDescription='A>G substitution at position 124', ChromosomeNumber=7, Position=124, GeneSymbol='BRCA1', DiseaseAssociated=true WHERE ID=1;
UPDATE MachineLearningModels SET Algorithm='Random Forest', Accuracy=0.85, ModelName='RF Model', ModelID=10 WHERE ModelID=10;
UPDATE Genes SET gene_name='ABC', gene_location='Chromosome 1' WHERE gene_id=1;
UPDATE Individuals SET age=30, gender='Male' WHERE individual_id=1;
UPDATE Genes SET gene_location = 'Chromosome 1' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE Diseases SET risk_factor = 0.75, disease_type = 'Chronic' WHERE disease_id = 3;
